name: Advance Course on Current Electricity and Capacitors
description: In this course, Nitin Sachan will provide in-depth knowledge of Current electricity and capacitors. The course will be helpful for aspirants preparing for IIT JEE. Learners at any stage of their preparation will be benefited from the course. All doubts related to the topic will be clarified during the doubt clearing sessions in the course. Class dates and timings along with topic details are given below. The course will be covered in Hindi and the notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Electric Current and Hollow, Annular and Infinite Cylinder
Infinite Cylinder, Drift Velocity, and Ohm's Law
Kirchoff's Law, Nodal Analysis, and Parallel Connections in Resistors
Effective Resistance of Solid Sphere, Cylinder, and Part of a Plate
Potential Difference Across a Battery and Charging Mode
Series & Parallel Combination of Batteries and Wheatstone Bridge
Symmetry in Electrical Circuits & Problem Solving
Infinite Circuits: Introduction and Problem Solving
Electrical Circuits: Problem Solving
Infinite 3D Grids: Introduction and Problem Solving
Battery Grids: Introduction and Problem Solving
Moving Coil Galvanometer, Ammeter, and Voltmeter
Rating of Bulb, Ammeter, Voltmeter, and Metre Bridge & its Errors
Modified Metre Bridge and Potentiometre & its Applications
Electrical Instruments: Fault at Two Points and Problem Solving
Doubt Clearing Session
Electrical Instruments: Post Office Box and Problem Solving
Capacitors: Parallel Plate, Cylindrical & Spherical Capacitor
Parallel Capacitor, Charging of Capacitor, and Conducting Spheres
Conducting Spheres and Problem Solving on Parallel Capacitor
Parallel Capacitor: Problem Solving
Dielectrics and Cell if a Metal Slab is Placed Inside
Dielectrics: Effect and Induced charges of Dielectrics
Isolated Capacitor, Force on Dielectric, and Problem Solving
Dielectrics: Problem Solving
RC Circuits: Charging of Capacitor and Heat Generated Across Capacitor
RC Circuits: RC Discharging Circuit, and Problem Solving
Mega quiz
